us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.interfaces

Interface ConvexPolygon2DBasics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Clearable, ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable, Vertex2DSupplier
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FixedFrameConvexPolygon2DBasics, FrameConvexPolygon2DBasics
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConvexPolygon2D, FrameConvexPolygon2D

    public interface ConvexPolygon2DBasics
extends ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Clearable, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable
    Write and read interface for a convex polygon defined in the XY-plane.

    This implementation of convex polygon is designed for garbage free operations.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.interfaces.Vertex2DSupplier

      • notifyVerticesChanged

        void notifyVerticesChanged()
        Notifies the vertices have changed and that this polygon has to be updated.

      • clear

        void clear()
        After calling this method, the polygon has no vertex, area, or centroid.

        Note that this polygon is marked as being out-of-date. The method update() has to be called afterward before being able to perform operations with this polygon.

      • clearAndUpdate

        void clearAndUpdate()
        After calling this method, the polygon has no vertex, area, or centroid.

        Use only when an empty polygon is desired.

      • setToZero

        default void setToZero()
        Clears this polygon, adds a single vertex at (0, 0), and updates it.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if at least one vertex contains Double.NaN, false otherwise.

      • update

        void update()
        Updates the vertices so they represent a clockwise convex polygon.

        Call this method after editing the vertices of this polygon.

        Note that this also updates centroid, area and the bounding box of this polygon.

      • updateBoundingBox

        default void updateBoundingBox()
        Updates the bounding box properties.

      • updateCentroidAndArea

        void updateCentroidAndArea()
        Compute centroid and area of this polygon. Formula taken from here.

      • getVertexUnsafe

        us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DBasics getVertexUnsafe(int index)
        Gets the reference to the indexth vertex of this polygon.

        WARNING: Through this method, the user can modify the vertices of this polygon without it being notified of such change. When modifying a vertex, the method notifyVerticesChanged() should be called followed by update(). Always prefer using ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly.getVertex(int) instead.

        Note that this polygon's vertices are clockwise ordered and that the first vertex has the lowest x-coordinate.

        Parameters:
        index - the index of the vertex in the clockwise ordered list.
        Returns:
        the reference to the vertex.
        Throws:
        OutdatedPolygonException - if update() has not been called since last time this polygon's vertices were edited.

      • addVertex

        void addVertex(double x,
               double y)
        Add a vertex to this polygon.

        Note that this polygon is marked as being out-of-date. The method update() has to be called afterward before being able to perform operations with this polygon.

        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the new vertex.
        y - the y-coordinate of the new vertex.

      • addVertex

        default void addVertex(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly vertex)
        Add a vertex to this polygon.

        Note that this polygon is marked as being out-of-date. The method update() has to be called afterward before being able to perform operations with this polygon.

        Parameters:
        vertex - the new vertex. Not modified.

      • addVertex

        Note that this polygon is marked as being out-of-date. The method update() has to be called afterward before being able to perform operations with this polygon.

        Parameters:

      • addVertices

        default void addVertices(Vertex2DSupplier vertex2DSupplier)
        Adds the vertices from the given vertex supplier.

        Note that this polygon is marked as being out-of-date. The method update() has to be called afterward before being able to perform operations with this polygon.

        Parameters:
        vertex2DSupplier - the supplier of vertices.
        See Also:
        Vertex2DSupplier

      • addVertices

        default void addVertices(Vertex3DSupplier vertex3DSupplier)
        Adds the vertices from the given vertex supplier.

        Note that this polygon is marked as being out-of-date. The method update() has to be called afterward before being able to perform operations with this polygon.

        Only the x and y coordinates of each vertex is used to add a vertex to this polygon.

        Parameters:
        vertex3DSupplier - the supplier of vertices.
        See Also:
        Vertex3DSupplier

      • removeVertex

        void removeVertex(int indexOfVertexToRemove)
        Removes the vertex of this polygon positioned at the index indexOfVertexToRemove.

        Note that this polygon is marked as being out-of-date. The method update() has to be called afterward before being able to perform operations with this polygon.

        Parameters:
        indexOfVertexToRemove - the index of the vertex to remove.
        Throws:
        EmptyPolygonException - if this polygon is empty before calling this method.
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the given index is either negative or greater or equal than the polygon's number of vertices.

      • set

        default void set(Vertex2DSupplier vertex2DSupplier)
        This method does:
        1. clear().
        2. addVertices(Vertex2DSupplier).
        3. update().
        Parameters:
        vertex2DSupplier - the supplier of vertices.
        See Also:
        Vertex2DSupplier, addVertices(Vertex2DSupplier)

      • set

        default void set(Vertex2DSupplier firstVertex2DSupplier,
                 Vertex2DSupplier secondVertex2DSupplier)
        Sets this polygon such that it represents the smallest convex hull that contains all the vertices supplied by the two suppliers.

        Note that the resulting polygon is ready to be used for any operations, no need to call update().

        Parameters:
        firstVertex2DSupplier - the first supplier of vertices.
        secondVertex2DSupplier - the second supplier of vertices.

      • scale

        default void scale(double scaleFactor)
        Scale this convex polygon about its centroid.

        The polygon centroid remains unchanged.

        Parameters:
        scaleFactor - the scale factor to apply to this polygon. A value of 1.0 does nothing.
        Throws:
        OutdatedPolygonException - if update() has not been called since last time this polygon's vertices were edited.
        EmptyPolygonException - if this polygon is empty when calling this method.

      • scale

        default void scale(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly pointToScaleAbout,
                   double scaleFactor)
        Scale this convex polygon about pointToScaleAbout.

        This method effectively modifies the vertices of this polygon such that the scale is applied on the distance between each vertex and the given pointToScaleAbout.

        If pointToScaleAbout is equal to a vertex of this polygon, the coordinates of this vertex will remain unmodified.

        Parameters:
        pointToScaleAbout - the center of the scale transformation. Not modified.
        scaleFactor - the scale factor to apply to this polygon. A value of 1.0 does nothing.
        Throws:
        OutdatedPolygonException - if update() has not been called since last time this polygon's vertices were edited.
        EmptyPolygonException - if this polygon is empty when calling this method.

      • translate

        default void translate(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Tuple2DReadOnly translation)
        Translates this polygon.
        Parameters:
        translation - the translation to apply to this polygon's vertices. Not modified.
        Throws:
        OutdatedPolygonException - if update() has not been called since last time this polygon's vertices were edited.
        EmptyPolygonException - if this polygon is empty when calling this method.

      • translate

        default void translate(double x,
                       double y)
        Translated this polygon.
        Parameters:
        x - the translation along the x-axis to apply to each of this polygon's vertices.
        y - the translation along the y-axis to apply to each of this polygon's vertices.
        Throws:
        OutdatedPolygonException - if update() has not been called since last time this polygon's vertices were edited.
        EmptyPolygonException - if this polygon is empty when calling this method.

      • applyTransform

        default void applyTransform(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.interfaces.Transform transform)
        Transforms this convex polygon using the given homogeneous transformation matrix.
        Specified by:
        applyTransform in interface us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable
        Parameters:
        transform - the transform to apply on the vertices of this convex polygon. Not modified.
        Throws:
        OutdatedPolygonException - if update() has not been called since last time this polygon's vertices were edited.
        EmptyPolygonException - if this polygon is empty when calling this method.
        us.ihmc.euclid.exceptions.NotAMatrix2DException - if the rotation part of transform is not a transformation in the XY-plane.

      • applyTransform

        default void applyTransform(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.interfaces.Transform transform,
                            boolean checkIfTransformInXYPlane)
        Transforms this convex polygon using the given homogeneous transformation matrix.
        Parameters:
        transform - the transform to apply on the vertices of this convex polygon. Not modified.
        checkIfTransformInXYPlane - whether this method should assert that the rotation part of the given transform represents a transformation in the XY plane.
        Throws:
        OutdatedPolygonException - if update() has not been called since last time this polygon's vertices were edited.
        EmptyPolygonException - if this polygon is empty when calling this method.
        us.ihmc.euclid.exceptions.NotAMatrix2DException - if checkIfTransformInXYPlane == true and the rotation part of transform is not a transformation in the XY plane.

      • applyInverseTransform

        default void applyInverseTransform(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.interfaces.Transform transform)
        Transforms this convex polygon using the inverse of the given homogeneous transformation matrix.
        Specified by:
        applyInverseTransform in interface us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable
        Parameters:
        transform - the transform to apply on the vertices of this convex polygon. Not modified.
        Throws:
        OutdatedPolygonException - if update() has not been called since last time this polygon's vertices were edited.
        EmptyPolygonException - if this polygon is empty when calling this method.
        us.ihmc.euclid.exceptions.NotAMatrix2DException - if the rotation part of transform is not a transformation in the XY-plane.

      • applyInverseTransform

        default void applyInverseTransform(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.interfaces.Transform transform,
                                   boolean checkIfTransformInXYPlane)
        Transforms this convex polygon using the inverse of the given homogeneous transformation matrix.
        Parameters:
        transform - the transform to apply on the vertices of this convex polygon. Not modified.
        checkIfTransformInXYPlane - whether this method should assert that the rotation part of the given transform represents a transformation in the XY plane.
        Throws:
        OutdatedPolygonException - if update() has not been called since last time this polygon's vertices were edited.
        EmptyPolygonException - if this polygon is empty when calling this method.
        us.ihmc.euclid.exceptions.NotAMatrix2DException - if checkIfTransformInXYPlane == true and the rotation part of transform is not a transformation in the XY plane.
